channel.title: Docs on GPT in Education
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on GPT in Education

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Show. Don’t tell. Here is a demonstration of one of the capabilities of GPT. The text box with a blue vertical line on the left is prompt, and the following section with four tabs is GPT’s response. Demo I am creating a website that describes the impact of ChatGPT on education. The first page is titled “introduction”, and I would like you to generate a few example introductions.
